description:
After a loud explosion, the main character wakes up in an unfamiliar place without a hint of the presence of people in the vicinity. The player has a phone that receives a message from an unknown subscriber. You have no choice but to follow the instructions sent from the "interlocutor" on your smartphone: find a way out of purgatory and atone for your sins during your lifetime to go to heaven.

The game offers you to go through the path to redemption, to get to the best place, getting rid of dissonance in your soul.
In the game you will find:
- 6 completely different locations that characterize the soul of the protagonist;
- 2 types of firearms with excellent shooting physics and melee weapons;
- Several styles of passing game;
- pressing atmosphere;
- battle mode in the arena, as an addition to the "history";
- frightening enemies.
